entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 12:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening then changing to freezing rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
